DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional , observational , open-label multi-center follow-up study patient U-Act-Early trial ( ML22497 ) evaluate long-term efficacy safety start tight control treatment RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) and/or methotrexate patient early disease follow treatment accord standard care routine clinical practice three year follow-up , independently treatment patient receiving .
DOC.brief_title: U-Act-After : An Observational Study Long-Term Efficacy Tight Control RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) and/or Methotrexate Patients With Early Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Have Participated U-Act-Early Study ( ML22497 )
DOC.criteria: Patients must participate UActEarly trial ( ML22497 ) ; adult patient ( > 20 year age ) rheumatoid arthritis . Patients must willing give write informed consent Patients participate UActEarly trial Patients dropouts UActEarly trial due withdrawal consent , lose followup serious protocol violator
